data.Title: Google Third-Party Cookies in Chrome Not Going Away
data.Description: After much back and forth, Google has decided to keep third-party cookies in its Chrome browser. Turns out all the fuss over the years wasn’t in vain after all; the ad industry’s cries have finally been heard.

data.Title: Google Search Tests Larger Sitenames and Favicons
Google Ads Has a New Sitelinks Interface
Google Ads Editor Version 2.7 Is Now Available
Google Search Video Descriptions Powered by AI Overviews
Alphabet Q2 Earnings: Revenue of $84.7B, Up 14% YoY
data.Description: "Google had a massive quarter thanks to Search and AI" -> Alphabet Q2: revenue of $84.7B, up 14% YoY, net income of $23.6B, up 29% YoY, Search revenue of $48.5B, up from $42.6B YoY, and headcount down 1% to 179,582

data.Title: YouTube Q2 Ad Revenue Grew 13% YoY to $8.66B
data.Description: YouTube Q2 ad revenue grew 13% YoY to $8.66B, vs. $8.93B est.; Google's subscriptions, platforms, and devices unit that includes YouTube TV had revenue of $9.3B

data.Title: Microsoft Partners With Publishers to Power Coupons in Bing SERPs
data.Description: A Hello Partner exclusive. We hear from the publishers involved in Bing’s latest coupon update.

data.Title: Google Shares Tips To Improve SEO Through Internal Links
data.Description: Google shares three key tips for effective internal linking to improve SEO and user experience on websites.

data.Title: Bing Tests Related Searches at the Top of the Search Results
data.Description: Bing is testing placing the related searches at the top of the search results page, directly under the search bar.  The searches are exactly what you would see in the bottom but in a different format at the top.
